###Diaceutics v2_deid_061517.csv

```{r cars,results="asis"}

source("Report.r")
     
library(knitr)
library(data.table)
library(xtable)
options(xtable.comment = FALSE)

     reportParams = ReportParameters$new(dataFile=tolower("Diaceutics v2_deid_061517.csv"), showOriginal = FALSE,extractedTextLength=80L, instancesToShow=100L, printInstances =FALSE,  wrapTextWidth=40L )
report<-Report$new(reportParams)


print(xtable(report$ShowTotalsdt(),align= c("|p{0cm}|", "p{6cm}|" ,"p{11cm}|"),caption="Hello there how are you doing folks great to see you"),include.rownames=FALSE,caption.placement = "top")


if(nrow(report$getSurgicalNumbers())>0){

  
 tab<- xtable(as.data.table(head(report$getSurgicalNumbers()[,c("rownumber","obfuscatedtext")],n=reportParams$instancesToShow)),caption="Hello there how are you doing folks great to see you",align= c("p{0cm}|", "p{2cm}|" ,"p{15cm}|"))
  names(tab) <- c('Row','Text' )
  print(tab,include.rownames=FALSE,caption.placement = "top" )

  
}
```
